text: What is the best way to turn a directory of 1 column CSV files to an array of arrays?

elements.text: What is the best way to turn a directory of 1 column CSV files to an array of arrays?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

Success, it has been cross posted <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/55462| to Discourse>. Keep and eye out on Discourse for responses and please add an answer there once you are satisfied with the solution so others can benefit as well. Happy debugging!
I believe you could accomplish this with an appropriate sequence of calls to `Base.Filesystem.readdir` , `Base.filter` , and `CSV.File` .
